metadata.title: CVE-2023-39663 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Mathjax up to v2.7.9 was discovered to contain two Regularexpression Denial of Service (ReDoS) vulnerabilities in MathJax.js via thecomponents pattern and markdownPattern. NOTE: the vendor disputes thisbecause the regular expressions are not applied to user input; thus, thereis no risk.

criterions.comment: mathjax: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not a vulnerability').
